title: Science Experiment Simulation Course Using Multimodal Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific experiment procedures and safety protocols
context.additional_context: Learning environment integrating theory and practice through chemistry lab simulations, utilizing digital tools such as VR devices and tablet PCs

learning_goals: Learners compare four multimodal material types (text, text+audio, text+image, video) and explain the relationship between cognitive load and learning efficiency.
Learners perform chemical experiment procedures with over 90% accuracy using the 'text+image' modality.
Learners produce experimental simulation materials applying multimodal design principles in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
